statements: SELECT * FROM product_recall
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM product_recall WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, recall_date FROM product_recall WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc'
SELECT * FROM product_recall ORDER BY recall_date DESC
SELECT product_id, product_name, recall_reason FROM product_recall WHERE recall_reason LIKE '%defective%'
SELECT * FROM product_recall WHERE product_id = 1
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM product_recall WHERE recall_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT product_name, recall_reason FROM product_recall WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY recall_date DESC
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, recall_date FROM product_recall WHERE product_name LIKE '%milk%'
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_recalls, manufacturer FROM product_recall GROUP BY manufacturer
SELECT * FROM product_recalls
SELECT product_name, recall_date FROM product_recalls WHERE recall_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT recall_id, product_name, recall_reason FROM product_recalls WHERE product_name = 'Product A'
SELECT product_name, withdrawal_id FROM product_withdrawals ORDER BY withdrawal_id DESC
SELECT * FROM product_recalls WHERE recall_reason LIKE '%safety%'
SELECT * FROM product_recalls;
SELECT product_name, recall_reason FROM product_recalls WHERE recall_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT recall_id, product_name, recall_reason, recall_date FROM product_recalls WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM product_recalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, withdrawal_reason FROM product_withdrawals WHERE withdrawal_date <= '2021-06-30';
SELECT * FROM product_recalls;
SELECT product_name, recall_reason FROM product_recalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT recall_id, product_name, recall_reason, recall_date FROM product_recalls WHERE recall_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recall_participants WHERE participant_role IS NOT NULL;
SELECT participant_name, action_description FROM recall_participants JOIN recall_actions ON recall_participants.participant_id = recall_actions.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM product_recalls;
SELECT product_name, recall_date FROM product_recalls WHERE recall_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, COUNT(recall_id) AS total_recalls FROM product_recalls GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT participant_name, participant_role, product_name FROM recall_participants rp JOIN product_recalls pr ON rp.recall_id = pr.recall_id;
SELECT action_description, action_date, participant_name, participant_role FROM recall_actions ra JOIN recall_participants rp ON ra.participant_id = rp.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductRecalls;
SELECT recall_id, product_name, recall_date FROM ProductRecalls WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, recall_reason FROM ProductRecalls WHERE recall_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT recall_id, recall_reason, quantity FROM ProductRecalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM RecallLogs WHERE action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM ProductRecalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC, recall_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT recall_id, product_name, quantity FROM ProductRecalls WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY product_name;

SELECT ProductRecalls.product_name, RecallLogs.action_taken, RecallLogs.action_date FROM ProductRecalls JOIN RecallLogs ON ProductRecalls.recall_id = RecallLogs.recall_id WHERE RecallLogs.action_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';

SELECT Withdrawals.product_name, ComplianceIssues.issue_description, ComplianceIssues.issue_date FROM Withdrawals LEFT JOIN ComplianceIssues ON Withdrawals.product_name = ComplianceIssues.issue_description WHERE ComplianceIssues.resolution_status = TRUE;
SELECT recall_id, COUNT(recall_id) AS recall_count FROM RecallLogs GROUP BY recall_id HAVING COUNT(recall_id) > 1 ORDER BY recall_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ProductRecalls;
SELECT product_name, recall_reason FROM ProductRecalls WHERE recall_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, recall_date FROM ProductRecalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT rh.status, rh.action_taken FROM RecallHistory rh JOIN ProductRecalls pr ON rh.recall_id = pr.recall_id;
SELECT rl.location_name, rl.location_address FROM RecallLocations rl INNER JOIN ProductRecalls pr ON rl.location_id = pr.recall_id;
SELECT * FROM ProductRecalls WHERE recall_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT product_name, recall_reason FROM ProductRecalls ORDER BY recall_date DESC;
SELECT p.product_name, h.status FROM ProductRecalls p JOIN RecallHistory h ON p.recall_id = h.recall_id WHERE h.status = 'Completed';
SELECT r.recall_id, r.recall_reason, c.regulation_name FROM ProductRecalls r JOIN ComplianceRegulations c ON r.product_name = c.regulation_name;

SELECT p.product_name, w.withdrawal_date, l.location_name FROM Withdrawals w JOIN RecallLocations l ON w.withdrawal_id = l.location_id JOIN ProductRecalls p ON w.product_name = p.product_name ORDER BY w.withdrawal_date ASC;
